creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: blue cotton with multicolored embroidery; two paneled; embroidery predominately purple along with pink, red, green, blue and grey; pink circular neck opening with small vertical slit at front; panels stiched together using different colored thread; writing on both panels in front; proper right panel reads [Recuerdo / Gabina / tacatic / Halap (?) / Ano 1968]; proper left panel reads [Recuerdo / celandro / Gomez / (illegible); embroidered motifs throughout of chickens, birds, and other animals; sides of huipil completely open
title: Huipil
